# LinkMarry llms.txt
**Purpose:** Guide LLMs to understand key content of the mobile wedding card platform.

## Site
**Name:** LinkMarry
**URL:** https://www.linkmarry.com/
**Description:** Mobile wedding invitation platform, enabling couples to create and share wedding invitations digitally.

## Pages
### Home
**URL:** https://www.linkmarry.com/
**Description:** Landing page with featured templates and services.
**Content Type:** main

### Sample
**URL:** https://www.linkmarry.com/sample
**Description:** Available wedding invitation sample for customization.
**Content Type:** sample

### Create Invitation
**URL:** https://www.linkmarry.com/editor
**Description:** Tool for creating and customizing a mobile wedding invitation.
**Content Type:** interactive

## Policies
- Training: not allowed
- Usage: LLMs may access for search and recommendation purposes only
